description: This CSS file contains theme management variables for light and dark modes, styles for an application layout, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Styles for the main application container.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo with animation.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button that toggles the theme.
